name: Radiance of the Dawn
effect: radiant AoE 30ft CON save for half damage dc 15 or 2d10+divine damage, dispels magical darkness
description: Radiance of the Dawn grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Spend MP to deal radiant damage and dispel magical darkness in a wide area.

name: Sacred Weapon
effect: Add CHA (minimum +1) to weapon attack rolls for 1 min + light + magical weapon
description: Sacred Weapon grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Channel divine energy to add CHA to attack rolls and make the weapon glow with radiant light for 1 minute.

name: Turn Fey
effect: Turn fey and fiends
description: Turn Fey grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Fey creatures within 30 feet must make a WIS save or become frightened and flee for 1 minute.

name: Turn Undead
effect: Turn undead
description: Turn Undead grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Undead within 30 feet must make a WIS save or flee for 1 minute. Higher-level undead may be destroyed.

name: Divine Intervention
effect: Call your deity to intervene directly in the world CHAnce of success equal to Divine
description: Divine Intervention grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Once per day, call on your deity for a miraculous effect. Roll percentile dice; if successful, the GM chooses a divine result.

name: Empty Body
effect: Turn invisible
description: Empty Body grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Spend MP to become invisible and resistant to all damage except force for 1 minute.

name: Tranquility
effect: 8hr Sanctuary Spell
description: Tranquility grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Gain a permanent aura of peace. Enemies must pass a CHA save to initiate combat with you.

name: Cloak of Shadows
effect: Turn invisible as an action
description: Cloak of Shadows grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Become invisible in dim light or darkness until you move or take an action.

name: Maddening Hex
effect: Deal psychic damage to target of hex + nearby creatures
description: Maddening Hex grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: When you use Hex, you may deal psychic damage to the target and nearby enemies once per turn.

name: Rage
effect: Bonus damage, resistance
description: Rage grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Enter a rage for 1 minute: gain bonus damage, resist physical damage, and make Strength checks with advantage.

name: Hurl Through Hell
effect: On next Hit: banish a target to hell, they return next round and take 10d10 psychic
description: Hurl Through Hell grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Spend 25 MP. as a Free. to On next Hit: banish a target to hell, they return next round and take 10d10 psychic. (CHA-based spellcasting).

name: Eldritch Sight
effect: Cast Detect Magic
description: Eldritch Sight grants a unique power or advantage in specific circumstances.
mechanical_description: Spend 0 MP. as a Action. to Cast Detect Magic. (CHA-based spellcasting).

name: Beast Speech
effect: Cast Speak with Animals

mechanical_description: Spend 0 MP. as a Action. to Cast Speak with Animals. (CHA-based spellcasting).
